languages.text:
Grants +25 Logic.
The wearer gains the {g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}Solve Simulacrum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can grant the wearer a permanent {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox Solved{/g} feature.

traits.locale_text: Grants +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}. The wearer gains the Solve Simulacrum {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic bonus is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

Grants +25 Logic. The wearer gains the Solve Simulacrum {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 penalty. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

获得+25逻辑。
装备者获得{g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}决心圣像{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，此能力消耗3点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，可以给予装备者永久特性：{g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}悖论解除{/g}。

traits.locale_text:
获得+25逻辑。
装备者获得{g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}决心圣像{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，此能力消耗3点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，可以给予装备者永久特性：{g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}悖论解除{/g}。

获得+25{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}逻辑{/g}。 装备者获得决心圣像{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，此能力会消耗3点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。装备者需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:Test}逻辑{/g}检定，且在此次检定中受到-167{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若检定成功，则移除决心圣像效果，摧毁认知圣像。装备者会失去+25逻辑加值，但会永久获得悖论解除特性。 悖论解除：此角色可以无视{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}要求使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}，且英雄壮举不消耗士气值。

languages.text:
Дает +25 к Логике.
Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} {g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}Симулякр неоспоримости{/g}, которая требует 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и дает навсегда умение {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Парадокс неоспоримости{/g}.
languages.original_text: Grants +25 Logic. The wearer gains the Solve Simulacrum {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 penalty. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

traits.locale_text: Дает +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Логике{/g}. Персонаж получает способность Симулякр неоспоримости, которая требует 3 ОД и заставляет выполнить {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Логики со штрафом −167. В случае успеха способность исчезает, а персонаж может совершить {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} при любом значении {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g}. При этом расхода моментума не происходит, а {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}героический акт{/g} не требует {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}периода восстановления{/g}.

Дает +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Логике{/g}. Персонаж получает способность Симулякр неоспоримости, которая требует 3 ОД и заставляет выполнить {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Логики со штрафом −167. В случае успеха способность исчезает, а персонаж может совершить {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} при любом значении {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g}. При этом расхода моментума не происходит, а {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}героический акт{/g} не требует {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}периода восстановления{/g}.

languages.text:
論理を+25獲得する。
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を3消費し、{g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}偽物判別{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。成功すると、使用者は永続的に{g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}パラドックス判別{/g}を獲得できる。
languages.original_text:
Grants +25 Logic.
The wearer gains the {g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}Solve Simulacrum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can grant the wearer a permanent {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox Solved{/g} feature.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}論理{/g}を25獲得する。 使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を3消費する偽物判別{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得し、{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}167で使用者に論理{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を発動する。合格すると偽物判別が取り除かれ、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}量に関わらず{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用することができ、推進力を消費したり{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}英雄的行為{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}を設定する必要はない。

{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}論理{/g}を25獲得する。 使用者は偽物判別の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得して、このアビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を3消費し、使用者に-167の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を伴う論理{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を要求する。成功すると、偽物判別 が取り除かれて、コグニ-シミュラクラムが破壊され、25の論理ボーナスを失い、 使用者はそのまま残るパラドックス判別を獲得する。 パラドックス判別：このキャラクターは、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}の量に関わらず、推進力を消費することなく{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を実行できる。

languages.text:
Otorga +25 de Lógica.
El personaje obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}simulacro de resolución{/g}, que cuesta 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y puede proporcionar al portador la característica {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradoja resuelta{/g} de forma permanente.

Grants +25 Logic.

traits.locale_text:
Otorga +25 de Lógica.
El personaje obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}simulacro de resolución{/g}, que cuesta 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y puede proporcionar al portador la característica {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradoja resuelta{/g} de forma permanente.

Otorga +25 de Lógica. El portador obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Simulacro de resolución, que cuesta 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y activa una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de Lógica para el portador con una penalización de −167. Si la supera, Simulacro de resolución se elimina, el cognisimulacro se destruye, la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +25 de Lógica se pierde y el portador obtiene permanentemente la aptitud Paradoja resuelta. Paradoja resuelta: este personaje puede usar su {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} independientemente del valor de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} y no lo consume.

languages.text:
Gewährt +25 Logik.
Der Träger erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} {g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}Simulacrum auflösen{/g}, die 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet und dem Träger dauerhaft das Merkmal {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox gelöst{/g} gewährt.

Grants +25 Logic.
The wearer gains the {g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}Solve Simulacrum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can grant the wearer a permanent {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox Solved{/g} feature.

languages.text:
Confère +25 de Logique.
L'utilisateur acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} {g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}Simulacre de résolution{/g} pour 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et reçoit de façon permanente la caractéristique {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradoxe résolu{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Grants +25 Logic.
The wearer gains the {g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}Solve Simulacrum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can grant the wearer a permanent {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox Solved{/g} feature.

traits.locale_text: Confère +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logique{/g}. L'utilisateur acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Résolution du Simulacrum pour 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et déclenche un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de Logique avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -167. Si l'utilisateur réussit ce test, la capacité Résolution du Simulacrum lui est retirée et il peut utiliser son {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g}, indépendamment du nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} dont il dispose, sans dépenser de points de fougue, et mettre l'{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}acte héroïque{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}mode récupération{/g}.

Confère +25 de Logique.
L'utilisateur acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} {g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}Simulacre de résolution{/g} pour 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et reçoit de façon permanente la caractéristique {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradoxe résolu{/g}.

languages.text:
+25 Mantık kazandırır.
Takan kişi, 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcayan ve kişiye kalıcı {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradoks Çözüldü{/g} özelliği verebilen {g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}Simulakrumu Çöz{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetini{/g} kazanır.

The wearer gains the {g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}Solve Simulacrum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can grant the wearer a permanent {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox Solved{/g} feature.

traits.locale_text: +25 Mantık kazandırır. Takan kişi, 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcayan ve kullanan kişiyi −167 ceza puanına sahip bir Mantık {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testine{/g} sokan {g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}Simulakrumu Çöz{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetini{/g} kazanır. Testi geçerse Simulakrumu Çöz ortadan kalkar, Kavra-Simulakrum imha olur, +25 Mantık {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} kaybolur ve takan kişi kalıcı olarak Paradoks Çözüldü özelliği kazanır. Paradoks Çözüldü: Bu karakter, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentumuna{/g} bakmaksızın hiç momentum harcamadan {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemini{/g} kullanabilir.

+25 Mantık kazandırır.
Takan kişi, 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcayan ve kişiye kalıcı {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradoks Çözüldü{/g} özelliği verebilen {g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}Simulakrumu Çöz{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetini{/g} kazanır.
